name: Dodge
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nDamage you take is reduced by your LUCK.

name: Block
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nPhysical Damage you take is reduced by half.

name: Cleave
text: Make a weapon attack against each adjacent enemy.

name: Sabotage
text: Attach this to an Enemy.\n\n When this character takes a major action they take it against themselves instead, then they discard this card.

name: Second Wind
text: Target ally shuffles their graveyard into their library, gains 2*WIL3 hp, and draws a card.

name: Taunt
text: Attach this to your character for one turn.\n\nAdjacent enemies can't use major actions unless they target you.

name: Assassinate
text: Deal 3*AGI3 damage to target enemy, then attach this to your character for one turn.\n\n Damage that you take is increased by 1.

name: Purify
text: Kill target undead creature or draw a card.

name: Duel
text: Make a weapon attack against an adjacent enemy, then attach this card to that target for one turn.\n\nThis character can't take actions unless they target you.

name: Poison
text: Attach this to an Enemy for 2 turns.\n\nAt the start of this character's turn they take 4 poison damage

name: Sunburst
text: Deal WIL3 holy damage to each enemy.

name: Blinding Spray
text: Up to 3 enemies attack as if their opponents are dodging until your next turn.

name: Surge
text: Regain 2*WIL3 life. Attach this card to your character for one turn.\n\nDamage dealt by you is increased by 2.

name: Sunder
text: Attach this to an Enemy for one turn.\n\nReduce all of target's damage resistances by 2*KLG3 or 2*STR3. They can't go lower than 0.

name: Mass Heal
text: Each ally regains 2*FTH3 hp.

name: Dancing Blade
text: Deal AGI3 damage, then you may move.

name: Siphon Life
text: Deal WIL3 Holy damage. Then heal an Ally for the damage dealt.

name: Double Slash
text: Make a weapon attack against an adjacent enemy, then make a weapon attack against an adjacent enemy.

name: Feint
text: Attach this to an Enemy for one turn.\n\nThe next time target enemy attacks you prevent up to 5 damage from that attack, then make a weapon attack against them, then discard this card.

name: Holy Aura
text: Attach this to an ally for two turns.\n\nAll damage this character does is increased by 2 Holy.

name: Kidney Punch
text: Make a weapon attack against an adjacent enemy, then draw a card.

name: Water Stance
text: The next 2 times you would take damage, deal that damage to the source of the damage instead\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand.

name: Fire Stance
text: Whenever you would deal damage, deal that + 2 fire damage instead. Whenever you take damage, take 1 additinal fire damage\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand.

name: Earth Stance
text: Increase your physical armor by 1. You cannot be moved by enemy abilities\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand.

name: Wind Stance
text: You are dodging. You may take one free move action on each of your turns.\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand.

name: One Inch Punch
text: Deal STR3 damage to an adjacent enemy, then you may move that enemy.\n\nIf you are in Fire Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Mighty Stomp
text: Deal 1 irreducible damage to adjacent enemies. They lose one Major action on their next turns. \n\nIf you are in Earth Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Ura Shuto
text: Deal AGI3 damage to an adjacent enemy. The next Major action they take targets themselves if possible.\n\nIf you are in Water Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Shukuchi
text:
Attach this to your character for one turn.

You cannot be targeted by enemy actions.

If you are in Air Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Aura Burst
text: Put up to 4 cards from your deck into your discard.\n\n Deal damage equal to the sum of the STR on those cards to target adjacent enemy and each enemy on their file.

name: Touch of Death
text: Deal 2*STR3 damage to an adjacent enemy. If this would reduce them to less than 3 or less health, destroy them instead.

name: Meditate
text: Shuffle up to 10 cards of your choice from your discard into your deck. Exhaust.

name: Focus Energy
text: Attach this to your character until you next deal damage.\n\nYou deal double damage.

name: Earthforged
text: This weapon gains 'All damage done with this weapon ignores armor.'\n\nThen, attack with that weapon.

name: Stormhammer
text: This weapon gains 'Whenever this weapon deals damage, gain 1 Momentum.'\n\nThen, attack with that weapon.

name: Flametongue
text: This weapon gains 'Whenever this weapon deals damage, deal an additional 2 Fire damage.'\n\nThen, attack with that weapon.

name: Twin Slam
text: Attack with each of your equipped Melee Weapons.

name: Chain Lightning
text: Deal WIL lightning damage to any 3 targets.\n\nGain 2 Momentum.

name: Stoneward
text: This Armor gains 'Reduce physical damage taken by 1'.

name: Grace of Air
text: This Armor gains 'At the start of your turn, gain 1 Momentum.'

name: Lava Blast
text: Costs 4 Momentum.\n\nDeal 3*WIL3 fire damage to all enemies in any file.

name: Cleansing Water
text: Restore WIL HP to any target. If you have 4 or more Momentum, restore 3*WIL3 HP instead.

name: Ice Lance
text: Deal KLG3 cold damage to any target

name: Holy Blow
text: Make a weapon attack against an adjacent enemy. This attack deals an additional 3 Holy damage.

name: Smite Evil
text: Attach this to an enemy within 6 tiles. You ignore that target's DR.

name: Lay On Hands
text: Target ally gains FTH4 hp and refreshes WIL2 cards.\n\nAttack pick: An ally gains 1 hp.

name: Zeal
text: Attach to yourself for 2 turns. As long as you've taken no Minor actions this turn, you may take 2 Major actions.\n\nAttack pick: Put that card on the bottom of your deck.

name: Inner Fire
text: Attach to yourself for 2 turns. Whenever you deal damage, deal an extra 1 fire damage.\n\nAttack pick: Deal 1 fire damage to your target(s).

name: Righteous Blow
text: Make a weapon attack. That attack also deals FTH3 Holy damage and WIL3 Fire damage.\n\nAttack pick: Deal yourself 2 fire damage.

name: Mercy
text: Choose one:\n-Deal FTH2 Holy damage to a target within 6 tiles.\n-Heal an ally for FTH2.

name: Rebuke Undead
text: Choose one:\n-Deal 2*FTH3 Holy damage to a target undead and it flees for WIL3 turns.\n-Draw a card.

name: Retribution
text: Make a weapon attack. If your target has dealt damage to you since your last turn, make 2 weapon attacks against that target instead.

name: Think Ahead
text: Draw two cards. Put one card from your hand on top of your deck.\nRecycle 1.

name: Interrupt
text: Contest INT with any enemy. If you win, counter target ability that enemy controls.

name: Borrowed Time
text: Gain 3 energy. Attach this to yourself for 3 turns. At the start of your turn, replenish 1 less energy.

name: Hold Monster
text: Contest ARC vs WIL with any enemy. If you win, attach this card to that enemy. That enemy can't take actions. At the end of that enemy's turn, contest ARC vs WIL. If you lose, discard this card.

name: Haste
text: Attach to any ally. At that start of that ally's turn, they replenish 2 additional energy.

name: Consider
text: Scry 2. Draw a card.\nRecycle 1.

name: Resistance
text: Target ally gains 1 Armor until the end of their next turn.

name: Bless Water
text: Put FTH3 Vials of Holy Water into ally decks.\nPick - Put a Vial of Holy Water in your hand.

name: Rebuke Undead
text: Choose one:\n-Deal 2*FTH3 Holy damage to a target undead and it flees for WIL3 turns.\n-Draw a card.
